alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 11 at 12:43PM MDT until October 11 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 7 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 6 PM MDT this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 3 AM to 7 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
